alert.note: Alert for Barbour; Bullock; Dallas; Lee; Lowndes; Macon; Marengo; Montgomery; Pike; Russell (Alabama) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Red Flag Warning issued October 07 at 5:00AM CDT until October 07 at 7:00PM CDT by NWS Birmingham
info.description: ...RED FLAG WARNING IN EFFECT ON SATURDAY FROM 11 AM TO 7 PM ACROSS PORTIONS OF SOUTH CENTRAL ALABAMA... ...RED FLAG WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 11 AM THIS MORNING TO 7 PM CDT THIS EVENING FOR DRY FUELS AND LOW RELATIVE HUMIDITY VALUES ACROSS THE SOUTHERN THIRD OF CENTRAL ALABAMA... ...FIRE WEATHER WATCH REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM SUNDAY MORNING THROUGH SUNDAY EVENING FOR DRY FUELS AND LOW RELATIVE HUMIDITY VALUES ACROSS THE SOUTHERN THIRD OF CENTRAL ALABAMA... * WINDS...North 10 to 15 mph with gusts up to 25 mph. * RELATIVE HUMIDITY...As low as 21 percent. * IMPACTS...The combination of a dry air mass and breezy conditions will result in critical fire weather conditions. Outdoor burning is not recommended. * IMPACTS...The combination of a dry air mass and windy conditions will result in critical fire weather conditions. Outdoor burning is not recommended.
info.instruction: A Red Flag Warning means that critical fire weather conditions are either occurring now....or will shortly. A combination of strong winds...low relative humidity...and warm temperatures can contribute to extreme fire behavior. A Fire Weather Watch means that critical fire weather conditions are forecast to occur. Listen for later forecasts and possible Red Flag Warnings.
